text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo NO social distancing, NO masks, and NO gloves. tRUMP KNEW about #COVID19, and IGNORES his own @CDCgov guidelines. Perhaps he should care MORE about Americans' HEALTH (he does NOT!) & LESS about "ratings".  #BlueWave2020 to take the trash out that @GOP Sens refused to in Jan!
